text: The Barnsley Association League was a football competition for clubs in the Barnsley area of England. ==History== It was founded as the Barnsley Minor Cup League in 1894, changing name to the Association League in 1909. The competition folded in 2005. ==Honours== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center; font-size:85%" |- !width=50|Season !width=250| |- |1894–95 |Hoyland Town |- |1995–96 |Swinton Town |-
